title: Padre Ignacio, Or The Song Of Temptation
creator: Owen Wister
description: LibriVox recording of Padre Ignacio, Or The Song Of Temptation, by Owen Wister. Read by David Wales. Padre Ignacio has been the pastor of California mission Santa Ysabel del Mar for twenty years. In 1855 a stranger rides into the mission bringing news and a spiritual crisis. It's really more of a novella than a novel. (Summary by David Wales) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; literature; audiobook; historical fiction; music; religion; westerns
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
